title: FS T206 NY Nat. - 2 Cards SOLD - 1 Re-listed
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS T206 NY Nat. - 2 Cards SOLD - 1 Re-listed
posts.post_content:
Two of the cards are SOLD. Bridwell will be re-listed.

Thanks for looking.

Hi,

I have for sale a three T206 New York Nationals player cards. 

All cards are decent. The Bridwell is actually very nice. In the upper right corner of the Bridwell, that is a hair in the scan, not a crease. Take a look for yourself.

The price for this group is now $70 if you use PayPal F & F.
The price is now $74 if you use regular PayPal with fees.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/nynat.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-054t.jpg[/IMG]
Click on the picture to look at a larger scan of all of the fronts and backs of the three cards[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back. 
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board. 
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy

The price of this group has now been lowered to $70 if you use PayPal F&F. It is $74 if you want to use regular PayPal.

Thanks.

Cy
